sentence.text: There have been no formal drug-interaction studies performed with Mylotarg.
sentence.negationtags: There have been <scope> <cue> no </cue> formal drug-interaction studies performed with Mylotarg. </scope>

sentence.text: The potential for drug-drug interaction with drugs affected by cytochrome P450 enzymes may not be ruled out.
sentence.negationtags: The potential for drug-drug interaction with drugs affected by cytochrome P450 enzymes may <scope> <cue> not </cue> be ruled out. </scope>

sentence.text: Mylotarg is not known to interfere with any routine diagnostic tests.
sentence.negationtags: Mylotarg is <scope> <cue> not </cue> known to interfere with any routine diagnostic tests. </scope>
